trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Daly City
There were no other sightings in Daly City on or around October 31st 1972
divs: sighting detailsthe witness was outside with his parents and older brother, not far from their home on beaver street in san francisco, california when all of a sudden an object streaked overhead. the witness stated that his brother called out "look at that" and when the witness looked up he observed a cigar shaped object that was black in color and had what appeared to be two bright white lights on its aft end. the observation lasted only for an estimated 2 to 2 1\2 seconds. there was no sound associated with the object, nor was there an exhaust or trail coming from the object. it had no appendages such as wings or tail. the witness estimated the object at 25 to 30 feet in length, moving at perhaps 400 mph at perhaps 2,000 ft altitude. the night was clear with no clouds, but with a light wind.
Summary: Sighted a cigar shaped object with lights
